programme.title: MLB Plays of the Week
programme.desc: This weekly MLB highlights show showcases the most exciting plays from the past week's matches.

programme.title: TNT Sports Films
programme.desc: What does the future hold for sport in the battle against global warming? Reshmin Chowdhury meets people at all levels to discuss how sport can be a positive force for change.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.desc: The best bits from TNT Sports over the last week, including exclusive interviews, the best action and so much more.

programme.title: Tour de France Femmes
programme.desc: A review of the best action and stories from the 2025 Tour de France Women, as Pauline Ferrand-Prevot became the first French rider to win this iconic race.

programme.title: UCI Women's Continental Circuits
programme.desc: Women's Cycling Pro Series action from the third and final stage of the 2025 Tour of Poland, as the riders journey 128km from Naleczow to a finish in Krasnik.

programme.title: Danmark Rundt
programme.desc: Men's Cycling Pro Series action from stage three of the 2025 Tour of Denmark, as the riders face a 14km individual time trial around the town of Kerteminde.

programme.title: UCI Continental Circuits
programme.desc: Men's Cycling Pro Series action from stage one of the 2025 Tour of Czech Republic, as the riders set out from Prague on a 163km route to Karlovy Vary.

programme.title: Live: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face St Kilda.

programme.title: CPL T20
programme.desc: Highlights from the opening contest of the 2025 Caribbean Premier League, as St Kitts & Nevis Patriots face Antigua & Barbuda Falcons at Warner Park.

programme.title: Live: UCI Continental Circuits
programme.desc: Men's Cycling Pro Series action from stage two of the 2025 Tour of Czech Republic. This 173km route takes the riders from Pardubice to Dlouhe Strane.

programme.title: International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: Action from the second T20 between Australia and South Africa at Marrara Stadium in Darwin. The Proteas need a win to stay alive in this three-match series.

programme.title: One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Action from the third ODI between West Indies and Pakistan at Brian Lara Cricket Academy. Can the Windies complete a turnaround to seal this three-match series?

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Angling magazine show presented by Rob Hughes and Andy Ford. In the last episode of the series, Rob's on a Christmas perch hunt and Andy examines some serious environmental issues.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face St Kilda.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Fremantle play Brisbane Lions.

programme.title: Tom Aspinall's Fight Lab
programme.desc: Heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall previews UFC 319, which will feature the middleweight title bout between Dricus du Plessis and Khamzat Chimaev.

programme.title: UFC Countdown
programme.desc: A countdown to UFC 319 at the United Center in Chicago, where Dricus du Plessis and Khamzat Chimaev will go to battle for the middleweight title.

programme.title: UFC Connected
programme.desc: Malcolm Wellmaker details leaving his blue-collar job for a full-time career in MMA. And, we join Brandon Moreno front row at UFC 317 for the flyweight title fight.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face St Kilda.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Fremantle play Brisbane Lions.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: In this Golden Horse winner starring Gordon Lam, a retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian drug mule.

programme.title: Where the Wind Blows
programme.desc: Two notorious corrupt police officers, Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong were found to build a corruption network between the triad and police, the ICAC begins to hunt them down to end their control.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is sealed away by the Dragon Master centuries ago and his daughter must travel back in time to kill the Dragon Master in order to reverse the act. But will she succeed?

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: Bernard and Lung plan to get married when their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for all involved!

programme.title: The Wandering Earth 2
programme.desc: Set as a prequel, when the sun was found to be dying, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home. To save the world, a group of young people decide to step forth.

programme.title: The White Storm 3: Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Two undercover cops successfully develop a brotherly bond with a Thai drug lord. When the police busts the syndicate, the drug lord discovers that there is betrayal within his circle of trust...

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: A pregnant painter hires a confinement nanny, but inexplicable incidents start happening in the house as her one-month confinement begins, threatening her and her baby daughter...

programme.title: Ready o/r Knot
programme.desc: A couple who first meet at a wedding & have been together for five years, question the institution of marriage from opposing viewpoints. Should marriage always be the 'next step.'?

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behavior and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. When he meets his teenage nephew who is ashamed of his stutter, the two develop a special friendship through mutual understanding.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling, who dreams of becoming a secret agent, accidentally rescues an injured spy. He agrees to make her his apprentice, turning her upside down as she goes on madcap adventures.

programme.title: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: An innocent Hong Kong businessman is wrongfully imprisoned in a brutal multinational prison, and must escape the sadistic warden's torture to survive.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

programme.title: Marrying Mr. Perfect
programme.desc: Heartbroken after a breakup, a woman meets a rich tycoon who is under disguise as his driver to escape his conflict. They fall in love soon after, with her completely ignorant of his true identity.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by Wong Kar Wai, this epic action film begins in Foshan when Ip Man defending southern fighting styles against a master of the North, Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Bored with their mundane country lifestyle, a retired superhero couple sets out to make a comeback at the upcoming Martial World Assembly.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.title: Cesium Fallout
programme.desc: Hong Kong's survival is at risk due to a radiation leak. A fire brigade is assigned to stop cesium fallout by entering the radiation zone. Facing this unprecedented disaster, can they save the city?

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: When the reluctant son of a gangster is summoned home to avenge his father's death, he enlists his father's always-drunk bodyguard to help him out.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat plays the unlucky gambler Chui Sui-Fai, whose ex-girlfriend asks him to take care of their autistic son. He reluctantly agreed and the two slowly begin to build their relationship.

programme.title: Article 20
programme.desc: Prosecutor Han Ming battles a case of intentional injury, risking all for justice. In a gripping finale, he transforms it into a fight for fairness, defending what is right.

programme.title: Journey to the West: The Demons
programme.desc: A monk brings his three disciples on a journey to the West. Along the way they resolve their inner conflict and learn to work together, battling fantastic creatures including a spider demon.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai is framed for murder. He takes hostages at the police station and demands talk with a former negotiator. As they engage in a tense battle of wits, their perspectives gradually shift.

programme.title: Septet : The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Starring Sammo Hung, Ann Hui, Patrick Tam, Yuen Wo Ping, Johnnie To & more, Hong Kong's seven most revered directors compose an anthology of stories for their beloved city.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the dangerous Kowloon Walled City, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom while becoming one of the City's protectors.

Their world is full of love and laughter as they explore Home Dome and the magical countryside of Teletubbyland through play. Familiar and beloved features from the original series return - The Noo-noo, Tubby Custard, Tubby Toast, Baby Sun, rabbits and the Voice Trumpets - along with some brand new surprises. programme.title: Work It Out Wombats! 28
programme.desc: The Wombats organize the Treeborhood Talent Show. Malik and Zeke create their own Brother Day. Zadie makes noise with her Really Big, Really Loud Noisy Thing. The Wombats build a giant snow globe for Zeke. Super invents a Huggyback rider. Malik perfects a magic trick. The Wombats turn their one bedroom into three.

Season 3 of Australias real-life extreme version of hide and seek returns with an intense twist in the form of a large-scale heist. Nine pairs of ordinary Australians turn into shrewd Fugitives, starting with a robbery thatll see them stealth their way into Ballarat bank to steal up to $1 million dollars, before making their getaway to disappear without a trace. The goal is to make it to the e

Humanity has launched satellites into outer space and submarines to the ocean floor, but the ground below Earths surface remains shrouded in mystery. Are there profound secrets buried beneath layers of rock, or hidden in vast caves? Can the subterranean world below shed light on humanitys past, or even its future?

All pets allowed!! Our fur babies. Our companions. Our extended members of the family. Most people look at us and think we are out of our minds for loving our pets so much. But with Pet Frenzy, you get to understand why our love for them runs so deep. You get to chat to us and see how we live with them day to day. Each episode, a new animal, a new owner, a new challenge, and new relationship to

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE delivers the latest from Japan, Asia, and the rest of the world. While covering wide network of correspondents breaking news and developing stories, offering a perspective from this corner of the globe, a team of trusted anchors ties it all together to give you a picture of what's happening now, and what's ahead.

Robbie Cumming offers a personal take on life aboard his narrowboat home the Naughty Lass. The waterways explorer discovers the landscapes, towns and villages of the Midlands. He sets out on a challenging journey through summer, autumn and winter 2023/24 which takes him from Braunston, Northamptonshire through Birminghams maze of canals before heading south along the Grand Union Canal.

ABC News' acclaimed series '20/20' has distinguished itself as one of the most esteemed news programs in broadcast journalism. Amid the heated, competitive environment of primetime entertainment, '20/20' has demonstrated its ability to consistently attract a significant segment of the viewing audience by offering viewers more choices and more chances to learn about the world around them.
